title: I was a ninety pound weakling
creator_credit: Georges Dufaux, Wolf Koenig, Roman Kroitor and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An amusing character study of people who are anxious to keep themselves fit and to also keep other people in good condition. Sports coaches, gymnasium proprietors, exercise machine salesmen, a health book publisher and a yoga instructor are interviewed. They discuss the frequent low standards of physical fitness in Canada and the various ways they recommend for improving physical condition.
